venue.address_2: The Shoppes at Blackstone Valley Mall
venue.name: Blackstone Valley Cinema 14

item.description:
Let's get together for Hot Tub Time Machine. It looks like a silly comedy, so I'm tempted to give it a try.

Here's the story: Four guys get in a hot tub in 2010 and find themselves transported back in time to 1986. Some of them get a chance to change their lives. One of them tried to make sure he gets born.

The movie starts at 7:30 PM at Blackstone Valley Cinema. So let's meet in the lobby at 7:00. I'll wear my Superman cap so you can recognize me. If you need to reach me, my cell phone number is 508-981-0455.

So far, we have 1 Yes (me) and 1 Maybe. If we don't get another yes by Saturday afternoon, I'll cancel the meetup.

Anyone who wants to join me for food/drinks after the movie is welcome.

- David

group.name: The Worcester Movie Fans Meetup Group

item.name: Hot Tub Time Machine
